text: Gelo Rivera, (born on April 18, 2001) also known for his stage name as Gelo is a Filipino singer, rapper, vocalist, entertainer, musician and lyricist, is a one of the member of Filipino pop boyband group BGYO.https://peoplaid.com/2020/12/05/gelo-rivera ==Career== In 2020 he auditioned at Star Hunt Academy to be part of ABS-CBN network. He is a volleyball player. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Filipino singer-songwriters
title: Gelo Rivera
